pure_functions.name: UtilsModule.getLatestMeta(historyArray)
pure_functions.description: Gets latest metadata from history (assuming historyArray itself is not mutated).

pure_functions.name: UtilsModule.getDefaultState(appConfig)
pure_functions.description: Returns default application state based on config input.

pure_functions.name: StateHelpersPureModule.validateStateStructurePure(stateObj, configStateVersion, defaultStateFactory)
pure_functions.description: Validates state object structure based on inputs.

pure_functions.name: StateHelpersPureModule.mergeWithDefaultsPure(loadedState, defaultStateFactory, configStateVersion)
pure_functions.description: Merges loaded state with defaults based on inputs.

pure_functions.name: ToolRunnerPureHelpersModule.basicCodeLintPure(code, language)
pure_functions.description: Performs basic code linting based on inputs.

pure_functions.name: ToolRunnerPureHelpersModule.validateJsonStructurePure(jsonString)
pure_functions.description: Validates JSON string structure based on input.

pure_functions.name: ToolRunnerPureHelpersModule.diffTextPure(textA, textB)
pure_functions.description: Performs basic text diff based on inputs.

pure_functions.name: AgentLogicPureHelpersModule.getArtifactListSummaryPure(allMetaMap)
pure_functions.description: Generates artifact list summary string from input map.

pure_functions.name: AgentLogicPureHelpersModule.getRegisteredWebComponentsListPure(wcList)
pure_functions.description: Generates web component list summary string from input list.

semi_pure_functions.name: UtilsModule.trunc(str, len, ellipsis)
semi_pure_functions.description: Truncates string (ellipsis is a default from closure if not passed, making it semi).

semi_pure_functions.name: UtilsModule.sanitizeLlmJsonRespPure(rawText, externalLogger)
semi_pure_functions.description: Sanitizes raw text to JSON (externalLogger makes it semi-pure if used).

semi_pure_functions.name: boot.js isValidState(parsedState)
semi_pure_functions.description: Validates state, uses global `config`, `Utils`, `StateHelpersPure` from closure.

semi_pure_functions.name: StateHelpersPureModule.calculateDerivedStatsPure(confidenceHistory, critiqueFailHistory, tokenHistory, evaluationHistory, maxHistoryItems, evalPassThreshold)
semi_pure_functions.description: Calculates derived statistics (maxHistoryItems, evalPassThreshold might be from module consts or config if not passed, making it semi).

semi_pure_functions.name: ToolRunnerPureHelpersModule.mapMcpTypeToGeminiPure(mcpType, externalLogger)
semi_pure_functions.description: Maps MCP type, uses externalLogger from closure.

semi_pure_functions.name: ToolRunnerPureHelpersModule.convertMcpPropertiesToGeminiPure(mcpProps, externalLogger)
semi_pure_functions.description: Converts MCP props, uses externalLogger from closure.

semi_pure_functions.name: ToolRunnerPureHelpersModule.convertToGeminiFunctionDeclarationPure(mcpToolDefinition, externalLogger)
semi_pure_functions.description: Converts MCP tool def, uses externalLogger from closure.

semi_pure_functions.name: AgentLogicPureHelpersModule.getToolListSummaryPure(staticTools, dynamicTools, truncFn)
semi_pure_functions.description: Generates tool list summary, uses truncFn from closure.

semi_pure_functions.name: AgentLogicPureHelpersModule.summarizeHistoryPure(historyArray, label, maxItems, truncFn)
semi_pure_functions.description: Summarizes history, uses truncFn from closure.

semi_pure_functions.name: AgentLogicPureHelpersModule.assembleCorePromptPure(...)
semi_pure_functions.description: Assembles core prompt, uses truncFn and summarizeHistoryPure (which uses truncFn) from closure.

semi_pure_functions.name: AgentLogicPureHelpersModule.prepareArtifactSnippetsPure(allMetaMap, getArtifactContentFn, goalInfoType, truncFn)
semi_pure_functions.description: Prepares artifact snippets, uses getArtifactContentFn and truncFn from closure.

semi_pure_functions.name: AgentLogicPureHelpersModule.assembleCritiquePromptPure(template, llmProposal, goalInfo, truncFn)
semi_pure_functions.description: Assembles critique prompt, uses truncFn from closure.

semi_pure_functions.name: AgentLogicPureHelpersModule.assembleSummarizerPromptPure(template, stateSummary, recentLogs, artifactListSummary, truncFn)
semi_pure_functions.description: Assembles summarizer prompt, uses truncFn from closure.

semi_pure_functions.name: AgentLogicPureHelpersModule.checkHitlTriggersPure(...)
semi_pure_functions.description: Checks HITL triggers, logic is pure based on inputs but often called with data derived from state/config.

semi_pure_functions.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._assembleCorePromptContext(state, goalInfo, currentCycle)
semi_pure_functions.description: Internal: Assembles core prompt, uses AgentLogicPureHelpers (semi-pure) & Storage (boundary).

semi_pure_functions.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._assembleCritiquePromptContext(llmProposal, goalInfo)
semi_pure_functions.description: Internal: Assembles critique prompt context, uses AgentLogicPureHelpers (semi-pure) & Storage.

semi_pure_functions.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._checkHitlTriggersContext(...)
semi_pure_functions.description: Internal: Checks HITL triggers contextually, uses AgentLogicPureHelpers (semi-pure) & StateManager.

semi_pure_functions.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._processLlmApiResponse(apiCallResult, state, currentCycle)
semi_pure_functions.description: Processes LLM response, uses ApiClient.sanitizeLlmJsonResp (pure via Utils), updates UI (boundary).

semi_pure_functions.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._displayLlmIterationSuccessDetails(llmIterationResult, currentCycle)
semi_pure_functions.description: Displays LLM success details, calls UI (boundary).

boundary_io_functions.name: boot.js saveGenesisArtifacts(artifacts)
boundary_io_functions.description: Calls Storage (localStorage I/O), network fetch for boot.js content.

boundary_io_functions.name: CoreLogicModule.registerCoreWebComponents(StateManagerInstance, StorageInstance, LoggerInstance)
boundary_io_functions.description: customElements.define (DOM global mutation), Storage read, StateManager write.

boundary_orchestration_functions.name: boot.js verifyArtifactChecksum(id, cycle, expectedChecksum, versionId)
boundary_orchestration_functions.description: Orchestrates Storage read and checksum util.

boundary_orchestration_functions.name: boot.js startInteraction(action)
boundary_orchestration_functions.description: Orchestrates application start based on user action.

boundary_orchestration_functions.name: CoreLogicModule.initializeApplication()
boundary_orchestration_functions.description: Orchestrates initialization of all core application modules.

pure_instance_methods.name: StorageModule.prototype.getStorageUsage()
pure_instance_methods.description: Calculates localStorage usage (pure given localStorage state).

pure_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.isRunning()
pure_instance_methods.description: Returns if agent cycle is running.

pure_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.isAutonomous()
pure_instance_methods.description: Returns if agent is in autonomous mode.

pure_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.isWebComponentRegistered(tagName)
pure_instance_methods.description: Checks if web component is registered.

pure_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.getRegisteredWebComponents()
pure_instance_methods.description: Gets list of registered web components.

pure_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.getRefs()
pure_instance_methods.description: Returns cached UI DOM element references.

pure_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.isMetaSandboxPending()
pure_instance_methods.description: Checks if meta sandbox approval is pending.

pure_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.isHumanInterventionHidden()
pure_instance_methods.description: Checks if HITL UI is hidden.

semi_pure_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.getActiveGoalInfo()
semi_pure_instance_methods.description: Gets active goal info, reads from StateManager.

semi_pure_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.getState()
semi_pure_instance_methods.description: Returns current global state (read from internal state).

semi_pure_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.getArtifactMetadata(id, versionId)
semi_pure_instance_methods.description: Gets artifact metadata (read from internal state).

semi_pure_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.getArtifactMetadataAllVersions(id)
semi_pure_instance_methods.description: Gets all versions of artifact metadata (read from internal state).

semi_pure_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.getAllArtifactMetadata()
semi_pure_instance_methods.description: Gets latest metadata for all artifacts (read from internal state).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: StorageModule.prototype.clearAllReploidData()
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Clears all app data from storage.

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: ApiClientModule.prototype.sanitizeLlmJsonResp(rawText)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Sanitizes raw text to JSON (calls pure helper, logs via closure).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: ApiClientModule.prototype.callGeminiAPIStream(...)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Internal: Makes streaming Gemini API call (network I/O).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: ApiClientModule.prototype.callApiWithRetry(...)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Calls Gemini API with retry logic (network I/O).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: ToolRunnerModule.prototype.runToolInternal(toolName, toolArgs, injectedStaticTools, injectedDynamicTools, uiHooks)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Executes a tool (can involve Storage, StateManager, ApiClient, Worker I/O).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.updateApiProgress(message)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Updates UI API progress indicator (DOM write).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.updateStreamingOutput(content, isFinal)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Updates LLM streaming output display (DOM write).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.clearStreamingOutput()
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Clears LLM streaming output display (DOM write).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.highlightCoreStep(stepIndex)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Highlights core loop step in UI (DOM write).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.logToTimeline(cycle, message, type, isSubStep, animate)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Adds entry to execution timeline (DOM write).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.logCoreLoopStep(cycle, stepIndex, message)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Logs core loop step to timeline (DOM write).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.summarizeCompletedCycleLog(outcome)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Summarizes completed cycle log in timeline (DOM write).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.clearCurrentCycleDetails()
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Clears current cycle details display (DOM write).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.displayCycleArtifact(...)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Displays artifact content in UI (DOM write).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.showMetaSandbox(htmlSource)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Shows meta-improvement sandbox UI (DOM write - iframe).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.updateStateDisplay()
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Updates UI elements based on state (DOM write).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: tool-worker.js self.LS_shim.getArtifactContent(id, cycle, versionId)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Shim for worker: requests artifact content (calls makeShimRequest - worker I/O).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: tool-worker.js self.StateManager_shim.getArtifactMetadata(id, versionId)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Shim for worker: requests artifact metadata (worker I/O).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: tool-worker.js self.StateManager_shim.getArtifactMetadataAllVersions(id)
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Shim for worker: requests all artifact metadata versions (worker I/O).

boundary_io_instance_methods.name: tool-worker.js self.StateManager_shim.getAllArtifactMetadata()
boundary_io_instance_methods.description: Shim for worker: requests all latest artifact metadata (worker I/O).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.init()
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Initializes StateManager (reads from Storage).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype._updateGlobalStateReference(newState)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Updates global state reference (internal state mutation).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.updateAndSaveState(updaterFn)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Updates state via function and saves (calls Storage).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype._saveInternal()
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Saves current state to storage (calls Storage).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.updateArtifactMetadata(id, type, description, cycle, checksum, source, versionId, isModular, newParadigm)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Updates artifact metadata and saves state (calls internal save).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.deleteArtifactMetadata(id, versionId)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Deletes artifact metadata and saves state (calls internal save).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.capturePreservationState(uiRefs)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Captures state for session preservation (reads logger, UI refs).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.restoreStateFromSession(restoreUIFn)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Restores state from session (calls Storage, UI callback).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.exportState(uiRefs)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Exports application state (DOM interaction for download).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.importState(file, importCallback)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Imports application state from file (FileReader API).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.addEvaluationResult(result)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Adds evaluation result to history and saves state.

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.addCritiqueFeedback(feedbackData)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Adds critique feedback to history and saves state.

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: StateManagerModule.prototype.registerWebComponent(tagName)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Registers web component tag name and saves state.

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.init()
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Initializes CycleLogic module (reads Storage).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._prepareFunctionDeclarations(state)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Prepares Gemini function declarations (calls ToolRunner).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._handleToolExecution(toolCall, state, currentCycle, uiHooks)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Handles LLM tool call execution (calls ToolRunner, UI, StateManager).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._executeLlmApiCallSequence(...)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Executes LLM API call sequence (calls ApiClient, _handleToolExecution).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._runLlmIteration(state, goalInfo, currentCycle)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Runs one LLM iteration (orchestrates pure helpers, ApiClient, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._runSingleAutoCritiqueInstance(...)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Runs single auto-critique LLM call (calls ApiClient, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._runAutoCritique(apiKey, llmProposal, goalInfo, currentCycle)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Orchestrates auto-critiques (calls _runSingleAutoCritiqueInstance, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._assembleHtmlFromPageComposition(...)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Assembles HTML (reads Storage, StateManager, calls UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._applyArtifactChanges(...)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Applies artifact changes (calls Storage, StateManager, Utils.calculateChecksum, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._applyToolDefinitionChanges(...)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Applies new tool definitions (calls StateManager, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._applyLLMChanges(llmResp, currentCycleNum, critiqueSource)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Applies all changes from LLM response (orchestrates artifact/tool changes).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._performCritique(state, llmResponse, goalInfo, currentCycle)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Decides and runs auto-critique (calls _runAutoCritique, StateManager, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._handleCritiqueDecision(state, llmResponse, goalInfo, currentCycle)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Handles critique outcomes and HITL triggers (calls _performCritique, StateManager, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._runSelfEvaluationStep(state, llmResponse, currentCycle)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Runs self-evaluation step (calls ToolRunner, StateManager, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._prepareCycle()
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Prepares state for a new cycle (reads StateManager, UI refs, calls StateManager updates).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._handleCycleIterationFailure(state, error, currentCycle)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Handles LLM iteration failures and retries (calls StateManager, UI, Utils.delay).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._handleApplyFailure(applyResult, critiqueDecision, currentCycle)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Handles failures in applying LLM changes (calls StateManager, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.executeCycle()
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Executes a full agent operational cycle (major orchestrator).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.proceedAfterHumanIntervention(...)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Processes human feedback to resume cycle (calls Storage, StateManager, UI, Utils.calculateChecksum).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.saveHtmlToHistory(htmlContent)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Saves page HTML to history (calls StateManager, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype._runSummarizationContext(apiKey, state, currentCycle)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Internal: Runs LLM call to summarize context (calls ApiClient, pure helpers).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.handleSummarizeContext()
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Initiates context summarization (calls _runSummarizationContext, Storage, StateManager, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.abortCurrentCycle()
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Aborts current agent cycle (calls ApiClient, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.startAutonomousRun(mode, cycles)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Starts autonomous agent run (calls StateManager, UI, executeCycle).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.stopAutonomousRun(reason)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Stops autonomous agent run (calls StateManager, UI).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: CycleLogicModule.prototype.runTool(toolName, args)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Directly runs a specified tool (calls ToolRunner).

boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.name: UIModule.prototype.init(injectedStateManager, injectedCycleLogic)
boundary_orchestration_instance_methods.description: Initializes UI Module (sets up listeners, reads StateManager, calls internal UI updates).

global_objects_constants_variables.name: boot.js core module holders (config, Utils, etc.)
